class PCTHierarchy[source]

PCTHierarchy(rows=1, cols=1, pre=[], post=[], name='pcthierarchy', links='single', history=False, **pargs)

A hierarchical perceptual control system, of PCTNodes.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
pre=Constant(5, name='precon')
post=Constant(10, name='postcon')
hpct = PCTHierarchy(3,3, pre=[pre], post=[post],links="dense")
hpct.hierarchy
